channel.title: About the announcement for Hydrascape
channel.description:
I own and host Hydrascape and all I have to say is what the hell?
There is nothing in the client, there is no password harvesting going on, and everything is 100% legitimate.
Please show me exactly what you are basing this nonsense on, because I'd like to see this "password stealer" seeing as I am hosting it.
An excellent program to scan what a program is doing is 'wireshark.' It shows all network connections and will clearly show that nothing is going on.
If you have other programs that can see what it's doing, feel free to use them. Decompile it even!
This is nothing more than a baseless and underhanded shot against my server because a few people are pissed off over something I don't even know about. Show me one piece of evidence that shows one thing is going on with hydrascape that isn't legitimate and I will shut the entire site and server down right now.
All I want is ONE PIECE OF EVIDENCE that backs up your announcement that is destroying my server.
If you can't provide me that, I don't see why that announcement is up.
I'll keep an eye on this thread and answer any questions until the announcement is deleted.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2008, 03:53:13 pm[/size][hr]Oh look at that, no one can provide ONE SINGLE BIT OF PROOF...

Does the run.bat even run that? Why hasn’t anyone posted this yet? Why is it .exe? Cause this is a FAKE picture i made. Well not fake but i used one of my tools and renamed it to ‘hydrascape client’ Shows how idiotic and easy faked pictures can be made. [quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=305121.msg2445230#msg2445230 date=1221690430]

item.title: About the announcement for Hydrascape
item.dc:creator: @Rex84 Rex84
item.description:
@Rex84 wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:16, topic:231650”][quote author=Rex84 link=topic=305121.msg2445195#msg2445195 date=1221689266]

But he did’nt “Just think” theres a reason for it.

And dont give bullshit about the legitimit thing, and how you know because your the hoster. You probably did put trojans and crap in it, your just pretending you did’nt.

EDIT: He wont be deleting crap untill you prove to them that its legetimit. And by the way, your so stupid for asking to demod MopMan. What a hypocrite.

So you’re saying that I am guilty until proven innocent? In that case, I declare that moparscape has a trojan in it until you prove me otherwise.

And I never asked to demod him, I am simply questioning his position because he is attempting to destroy my server with no proof of foul play.

If you want the proof that my client is clean, decompile it, scan it with a network monitor, or whatever else you want. Show me the proof and I will SHUT THE SITE DOWN.

If I post proof that its safe, people will cry “EDITED EDITED.” Do it yourself and see for yourself.

[/quote]


lawl[/quote]

Can’t argue with that then, I’ll be removing the links and server shortly. Sad to see something like this went under my radar.

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: About the announcement for Hydrascape
item.dc:creator: @Rex84 Rex84
item.description:
@Rex84 wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:10, topic:231650”][quote author=Rex84 link=topic=305121.msg2445188#msg2445188 date=1221689085]

Also in moparscape if we are in a download section and someone says ‘omg virus’, there is a 90% chance everyone will freak and say the same shit. It is also the same with ‘omfg leech’ when they DONT HAVE A CLUE if it is or not. They just want to be in the ‘in’ crowd. Also i never seen mopman or w-e hes called lie before. Thug lies so theres a difference lol

Exactly, just because someone claims something is unsafe does not mean its unsafe. We recently had to ban close to twenty users for duping, perhaps someone who was banned is just angry at us and is friends with mopman? In that case, I would have to call mopman on abusing his staff position. This baseless announcement is going to kill my server and over absolutely no proof aside from the word of a moderator that doesn’t even play my server.

Show me the proof or delete the announcement, is that so much to ask?
[/quote]
But this is mopman. He doesnt lie. Everyone else does. So yah hard case.

But he did’nt “Just think” theres a reason for it.

And dont give bullshit about the legitimit thing, and how you know because your the hoster. You probably did put trojans and crap in it, your just pretending you did’nt.

EDIT: He wont be deleting crap untill you prove to them that its legetimit. And by the way, your so stupid for asking to demod MopMan. What a hypocrite.

Err how can they prove their how you said it ‘legetimit’ ( rofl )
I never even heard of hydrascape >_> some crappy server who asks for rs passes to log in i guess???[/quote]

We don’t ask for RS Passes anywhere, where are you getting that idea? I am getting really tired of all these baseless accusations.

Also, all passwords are stored in double salted md5 hashlinks securely placed in the mySQL database. I can’t magically read them.

Read full topic

item.title: About the announcement for Hydrascape
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Also in moparscape if we are in a download section and someone says ‘omg virus’, there is a 90% chance everyone will freak and say the same shit. It is also the same with ‘omfg leech’ when they DONT HAVE A CLUE if it is or not. They just want to be in the ‘in’ crowd. Also i never seen mopman or w-e hes called lie before. Thug lies so theres a difference lol

::EDIT::

[quote=“Rex84, post:5, topic:231650”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=305121.msg2445182#msg2445182 date=1221688800]

it is being run by known scammers, probably with the intention of stealing any passwords they can get from you after they’ve whored everyone for their money through donations and adverts

Thats all we need. Nuff said.

All you need is a baseless accusation by a moderator with absolutely no proof to back it up?

As I said, show me this proof of foul play and I will TAKE THE SITE DOWN.

How can you be so stupid to just take the comments of one as truth with absolutely no proof?

If that’s the case, the sky is green and the sun won’t come up tomorrow unless you pay me $50.

You sir have failed. Why would a Moderator just decide to post about Hydracape in the Announcements? Obviosuly theres a reason.
[/quote]

If there is a reason, it is unknown to me. It is silly to think that a person I have never heard of knows more about my server than I do, when I HOST IT.

All I am asking for is that reason, and no one can provide it to me. I have seen the client inside and out, I know the staff well, and I know how everything works within my community. There is nothing going on, but somehow when some moderator here makes a comment with no proof, everything stops?

How would you like it if you spent months making a server that is 100% legitimate and someone came along and made an outright lie claiming your server is unsafe? It’s pretty damn frustrating.

Adding to the frustration, no one has a single shred of proof that something is going on, and yet the announcement stays up?[/quote]
Read my post.

Read full topic
